title: I'm trying to add someone as a friend but it doesn't work!!! pls help
body: I'm trying to add someone as a friend but when i type in there summoner name, it says they don't exist. can anyone help??

replies.body: Make sure you're typing their name in correctly, as some people use numbers instead of letters such as l33t sp34k. If you know you're typing it in correctly, I wonder if that summoner is on the same region as you are?
